Hi,

> Hmm that is very odd. Here I was able to send arbitrary data, in utf=
-8, latin1 and raw binary, and it always comes back unchanged. 

I finally =
found some time to debug this. A small bug within Restlet. I have already s=
ubmitted a Patch [1]!

Basically a File.renameTo does not work and a Buffer=
edReader is reading into a BufferedWriter. When writing the "\n" is missing=
... The question remains, why the renameTo did not work?! Permissions shoul=
d not prevent this...

Best
Daniel

[1]: http://restlet.tigris.org/issues/s=
how_bug.cgi?id=3D1018
